name: Crypto Utils
tooltip: Check out Crypto Utils in the Google Workspace Marketplace!
title: Crypto Utils for Google Sheets
subtitle: Open source on GitHub:

description: Crypto Utils is a Google Sheets add-on written using Google Apps Script (GAS) that provides a selection of cryptocurrency data retrieval capabilities.
Crypto Utils is fully open source for transparency, and accessible on GitHub.

bullets.name: Wallet Balances
items: Retrieve balances from public cryptocurrency wallet addresses for a variety of supported cryptocurrencies.

bullets.name: Exchange Balances
items: Retrieve balances from cryptocurrency exchange accounts for a variety of supported cryptocurrency exchanges.

markdown.body:
##### Code Example & Usage
```/**
 * Fetches balance(s) of public ETH wallet(s).
 *
 * @param {string} addresses - Comma-separated list of public wallet addresses as string.
 * @param {string} apiKey - Personal etherscan.io API key.
 *
 * @return {number} The total amount of the cryptocurrency stored in the wallet(s).
 */
function fetchEthereumBalance(addresses: string, apiKey: string) {
  let totalAmount = 0
  for (let address of addresses) {
    let addressInfo = utilCleanAddress(address)
    address = addressInfo["address"]

    const url = "https://api.etherscan.io/api?module=account&action=balance&address=" + address + "&tag=latest&apikey=" + apiKey
    
    let amount = utilGetCryptoAmountFromApi(url, address, "result", 1000000000000000000)
    
    console.log("Amount: " + amount)
    totalAmount += amount
  }
  return totalAmount
}
```
```
=CRYPTO_PRICE("ETH", "USD", apis!C2)
=CRYPTO_PRICE_ON_DATE("ETH", "USD",  apis!C2, "1619827200")
=CRYPTO_NAME("ETH")
=CRYPTO_TYPE("ETH")
=CRYPTO_WALLET_TICKERS()
=CRYPTO_WALLET_BALANCE("ETH", "0xAb5801a7D398351b8bE11C439e05C5B3259aeC9B", apis!C5)
=CRYPTO_EXCHANGES()
=CRYPTO_EXCHANGE_BALANCE("ETH", "binance-us", apis!A7 & ":" & apis!B7 & ":" & apis!C7)
```
